name: HOT PINK
description: HOT PINK is your fluorescent score attack nightmare. Take on your friends in endlessly rewarding block smashing challenges!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1 Processor: SSE2 support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 capable GPU (GeForce 8000 Series or Radeon 2000 Series) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 170 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection is required for leaderboards and syncing of stats.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Desktop: 2009 Core-i3, or 2011 AMD FX, or equivalent -- Laptop: 2012 Core-i5, or 2016 AMD A12, or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti or equivalent -- Radeon HD 5870 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 170 MB available space Additional Notes: Screen resolution of 640x480 or higher.
